description: We are now recruiting for an immediate start. Call now or text 07514643659 the word " BECKTON " for a quick response from our HR department. Job Title: Campaign Ambassador Location: London, UK Employment Type: Temporary, Full/Part time, Cash in Hand Daily Payment Job Description: Are you looking for an exciting and flexible opportunity to earn cash daily while immersing yourself in a thrilling new campaign in the heart of London? We have the perfect role for you as a Campaign Ambassador! Join our team and be part of something truly exceptional. Responsibilities: Campaign Engagement: As a Campaign Ambassador, you will be at the forefront of an exhilarating marketing campaign. You'll engage with the public, promote the campaign's message, and generate buzz and excitement in and around London. Product Knowledge: Master the campaign's details and key selling points. You will be the go-to source of information, answering questions and creating genuine interest. Street Team Activities: Join a dynamic team of like-minded individuals, and together, you'll execute various street-level activities such as handing out flyers, promotional materials, and merchandise, as well as encouraging participation and interaction and generating donations. Data Collection: Collect valuable data and feedback from the public to gauge campaign effectiveness. This data will play a crucial role in shaping the campaign's direction for the marketing director. Cash in Hand Daily Payment: Enjoy the flexibility of receiving daily cash payments for your work, making this opportunity an excellent choice for those looking for immediate financial rewards. Qualifications: Enthusiasm: A positive and outgoing attitude is a must. We're looking for individuals who can spread excitement and energy wherever they go. Effective Communication: Strong communication skills are vital, as you'll be interacting with a diverse range of people. Being approachable and persuasive is a plus. Reliability: Punctuality and commitment to your shifts are crucial to the success of the campaign. Self-Motivated: While you'll be part of a team, the ability to work independently and proactively is a valuable trait. Basic Knowledge of London: Familiarity with London's streets and hotspots is beneficial, but not a strict requirement. Benefits: Daily Cash Payments: Get paid for your work immediately after your shift ends. Flexibility: Choose your shifts to fit your schedule and lifestyle. Exciting Environment: Be part of a high-energy campaign that promises new experiences every day. Networking: Connect with like-minded individuals and potentially open doors to future opportunities. Invaluable Experience: Develop communication and sales skills while having a great time on the job. If you're ready to embrace an exciting and flexible temporary opportunity, this Campaign Ambassador role in London is perfect for you. Join us in making a difference and having fun while earning cash daily! Apply today and become a part of something truly extraordinary. FOR QUICK RESPONSE CALL/WHATSAPP OR TEXT " BECKTON " TO 07514643659 AND OUR RECRUITMENT TEAM WILL CONTACT YOU.

description: We are now recruiting for an immediate start. Call now or text 07915 002 334 the word " CROYDON " for a quick response from our HR department. Job Title: Campaign Ambassador Location: London, UK Employment Type: Temporary, Full/Part time, Cash in Hand Daily Payment Job Description: Are you looking for an exciting and flexible opportunity to earn cash daily while immersing yourself in a thrilling new campaign in the heart of London? We have the perfect role for you as a Campaign Ambassador! Join our team and be part of something truly exceptional. Responsibilities: Campaign Engagement: As a Campaign Ambassador, you will be at the forefront of an exhilarating marketing campaign. You'll engage with the public, promote the campaign's message, and generate buzz and excitement in and around London. Product Knowledge: Master the campaign's details and key selling points. You will be the go-to source of information, answering questions and creating genuine interest. Street Team Activities: Join a dynamic team of like-minded individuals, and together, you'll execute various street-level activities such as handing out flyers, promotional materials, and merchandise, as well as encouraging participation and interaction and generating donations. Data Collection: Collect valuable data and feedback from the public to gauge campaign effectiveness. This data will play a crucial role in shaping the campaign's direction for the marketing director. Cash in Hand Daily Payment: Enjoy the flexibility of receiving daily cash payments for your work, making this opportunity an excellent choice for those looking for immediate financial rewards. Qualifications: Enthusiasm: A positive and outgoing attitude is a must. We're looking for individuals who can spread excitement and energy wherever they go. Effective Communication: Strong communication skills are vital, as you'll be interacting with a diverse range of people. Being approachable and persuasive is a plus. Reliability: Punctuality and commitment to your shifts are crucial to the success of the campaign. Self-Motivated: While you'll be part of a team, the ability to work independently and proactively is a valuable trait. Basic Knowledge of London: Familiarity with London's streets and hotspots is beneficial, but not a strict requirement. Benefits: Daily Cash Payments: Get paid for your work immediately after your shift ends. Flexibility: Choose your shifts to fit your schedule and lifestyle. Exciting Environment: Be part of a high-energy campaign that promises new experiences every day. Networking: Connect with like-minded individuals and potentially open doors to future opportunities. Invaluable Experience: Develop communication and sales skills while having a great time on the job. If you're ready to embrace an exciting and flexible temporary opportunity, this Campaign Ambassador role in London is perfect for you. Join us in making a difference and having fun while earning cash daily! Apply today and become a part of something truly extraordinary. FOR QUICK RESPONSE CALL/WHATSAPP OR TEXT " CROYDON " TO 07915 002 334 AND OUR RECRUITMENT TEAM WILL CONTACT YOU.

title: Spread the Cheer & Earn Top Tier Commission! ‚ú®
description: Are you the life of the party? A natural-born storyteller? If you can strike up a conversation with anyone and have a passion for making a difference, Our Forgotten Neighbours needs YOU this festive season! We are looking for high-energy, "people-persons" to join our street fundraising squad immediately! As the weather gets colder, the plight of our forgotten neighbours becomes even more urgent. We need approachable, snazzy, and persuasive sales pros to be our voice on the streets of London. Earn up to ¬£200 per day with cash paid directly in hand. No experience necessary ‚Äì full training provided. The Gig: Where: You‚Äôll be at the heart of the action‚Äîoutside major supermarkets, bustling festive markets, and high-traffic tube stations. What: Chatting with the public, sharing the incredible work we do for those in need, and collecting vital donations. When: Flexibility is key! We have Full-Time (Mon‚ÄìFri) and Part-Time (Sat‚ÄìSun) flexible hours roles available throughout December. What‚Äôs In It For You? 40% Commission: One of the most competitive rates in the charity sector. Your hard work directly reflects your pay! Daily Cash Pay: No waiting for payday‚Äîget your earnings in hand at the end of every single shift. üí∏ Holiday Vibes: Spend your workday soaking up the festive atmosphere at London's most iconic Christmas spots. Who You Are: Sales Savvy: You have experience in sales or face-to-face customer service and know how to close a deal with a smile. Outgoing & Inviting: You‚Äôre the person people want to talk to. You are impeccable with people and can handle the public with grace and charm. Hardworking , Reliable & Driven, with a positive "can-do" attitude: You‚Äôre motivated by the cause not just the commission, showing up rain or shine to make a move for our neighbours (homeless and vulberable). What we offer: Supportive team environment, Cash paid daily. YOU MUST be available to start immediately. Make your Christmas count‚Äîboth for your pocket and for those who need it most. Ready to join the squad? Interested? Text "NEIGHBOURS" to 07892936771 to get started!

As they continue to grow, we are currently recruiting enthusiastic and motivated fundraisers to promote their activities and services to the public to raise money to continue making a positive difference to those in need. This is a commission-based role, with part time, full time and temporary opportunities available and fundraisers shall be expected to travel to different locations around the UK to do a street collection in busy areas, which you will be attending with your team leader. Starting between the hours between 9/10AM and return to the office between 5/6PM. Locations are based within or outside London, and the office is based in London, so it is essential that fundraisers can travel to the London area and can travel daily! You will be required to dress role as you will be outside! You must also be at least 18 years old, be fluent with English and be well-presented. SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE We welcome applications from those with experience Sales, Customer Service, Advertising, Promotions, Retail, Call Centre, Hospitality or Marketing. However, this isn‚Äôt essential the below skills are most important! ¬∑ Energised, with an enthusiastic and positive interaction with customers (BIG SMILES ARE ESSENTIAL)! ¬∑ Well-spoken with excellent communication skills. ¬∑ Strong time management and organisational skills, with responsibility to attend sites and return to the office on time, with prompt notification to team leader if any issues arise. ¬∑ Ability to explain and uphold the culture and values of the charity which is being represented on each shift, whilst adhering to the site‚Äôs code of conduct. WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM US. ¬∑ Cash in hand daily after each shift depending on amount of money raised. ¬∑ A flexible schedule, with shifts booked in weekly. ¬∑ All marketing and branded charity materials provided, including modern card machines (not everyone has cash!!). ¬∑ Training from professional sellers in the industry, who constantly support and motivate you to be at your best and develop excellent skills! SOUND LIKE YOU? ¬∑ WhatsApp the words ‚ÄòREAL DEAL‚Äô 07892936771 for fast response from our team. ¬∑ We shall contact you to provide more details on the role and how to sign up. ¬∑ To sign up, you will need to visit our office with a proof of address and ID! What are you waiting for? Apply today!!

title: Barber
description: Experienced Barber Wanted ‚Äì Part-Time / Full-Time We are currently seeking an experienced barber to join our professional team on a part-time or full-time basis. Requirements: ‚Ä¢ Minimum 4 years‚Äô barbering experience ‚Ä¢ Proficient in all aspects of barbering, including clipper work and scissor work ‚Ä¢ Punctual, reliable, and professional in both attitude and appearance ‚Ä¢ Ability to perform hot towel shaves (training can be provided if required) What We Offer: ‚Ä¢ Competitive rates of pay ‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours ‚Ä¢ Supportive and professional working environment If you are passionate about barbering and take pride in delivering high-quality service, we would love to hear from you. üì© Apply now by contacting David Williams on 07842516732 for more information

title: Spread the Cheer & Earn Top Tier Commission! ‚ú®
description: Are you the life of the party? A natural-born storyteller? If you can strike up a conversation with anyone and have a passion for making a difference, Our Forgotten Neighbours needs YOU this festive season! We are looking for high-energy, "people-persons" to join our street fundraising squad immediately! As the weather gets colder, the plight of our forgotten neighbours becomes even more urgent. We need approachable, snazzy, and persuasive sales pros to be our voice on the streets of London. Earn up to ¬£200 per day with cash paid directly in hand. No experience necessary ‚Äì full training provided. The Gig: Where: You‚Äôll be at the heart of the action‚Äîoutside major supermarkets, bustling festive markets, and high-traffic tube stations. What: Chatting with the public, sharing the incredible work we do for those in need, and collecting vital donations. When: Flexibility is key! We have Full-Time (Mon‚ÄìFri) and Part-Time (Sat‚ÄìSun) flexible hours roles available throughout December. What‚Äôs In It For You? 40% Commission: One of the most competitive rates in the charity sector. Your hard work directly reflects your pay! Daily Cash Pay: No waiting for payday‚Äîget your earnings in hand at the end of every single shift. üí∏ Holiday Vibes: Spend your workday soaking up the festive atmosphere at London's most iconic Christmas spots. Who You Are: Sales Savvy: You have experience in sales or face-to-face customer service and know how to close a deal with a smile. Outgoing & Inviting: You‚Äôre the person people want to talk to. You are impeccable with people and can handle the public with grace and charm. Hardworking , Reliable & Driven, with a positive "can-do" attitude: You‚Äôre motivated by the cause not just the commission, showing up rain or shine to make a move for our neighbours (homeless and vulberable). What we offer: Supportive team environment, Cash paid daily. YOU MUST be available to start immediately. Make your Christmas count‚Äîboth for your pocket and for those who need it most. Ready to join the squad? Interested? Text "NEIGHBOURS" to 07892936771 to get started!

description: CHARITY FUNDRAISING OPPORTUNITY ‚Äì ALL EXPERIENCE LEVELS WELCOME! WE NEED YOUR HELP! Our clients work tirelessly to improve the health, wellness and livelihoods for those who require support across the UK through their charities. This is a commission-based role, with part time, full time and temporary opportunities available and fundraisers shall be expected to travel to different locations around the UK to do a street collection in busy areas, which you will be attending with your team leader. WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM US. ¬∑ Cash in hand daily after each shift depending on amount of money raised. ¬∑ A flexible schedule, with shifts booked in weekly. ¬∑ All marketing and branded charity materials provided, including modern card machines (not everyone has cash!!). ¬∑ Training from professional sellers in the industry, who constantly support and motivate you to be at your best and develop excellent skills! What are you waiting for? Apply today!!

title: Experienced fundraisers ONLY - Great opportunity ! IF YOU HAVE EXPERIENCE WE HAVE THE SITES
salary: BRING YOUR A GAME WE HAVE THE BEST SITES Commission based OVER 30 YEARS FUNDRAISING EXPERIENCE.
description: EXCITING FUNDRAISING OPPORTUNITY ‚Äì EXPERIENCE NEEDED Looking to get BACK into fundraising or continue a current charity career? Whether you‚Äôre young and fresh with no experience or have been in the field for years, we‚Äôre keen for you to apply today to start immediately! We work with charitable clients to enhance the health, wellness, and livelihoods of those they support. We are looking to hire individuals from all backgrounds and experience levels to represent our charities and their activities at sites such as shopping centres and supermarkets across and beyond London. Although previous Sales, Marketing, Retail and Hospitality experience is useful, the key thing is to be enthusiastic and willing to learn, grow and develop across the sector! ESSENTIAL CRITERIA: ¬∑MUST HAVE PROVEN FUNDRAISING EXPERIENCE ¬∑ Be at least 18 years old. ¬∑ Live within the London area. ¬∑ Fluent in English. ¬∑ Well-groomed and presentable. BEHAVIOURAL COMPETENCIES: ¬∑ Energised, with an enthusiastic and positive interaction with customers (BIG SMILES ARE ESSENTIAL)! ¬∑ Well-spoken with excellent communication skills. ¬∑ Strong time management and organisational skills, with responsibility to attend sites on time, with prompt notification to team leader if any issues arise. ¬∑ Ability to explain and uphold the culture and values of the charity which is being represented on each shift, whilst adhering to the site‚Äôs code of conduct. BENEFITS: ¬∑ QUICK PAYMENT AFTER SHIFT ‚Äì CASH IN HAND DAILY! ¬∑ ALL BRANDED COLLECTION AND MARKETING MATERIALS ARE PROVIDED! ¬∑ USE MODERN CARD READERS TO INCREASE DONATIONS! ¬∑ THOROUGH TRAINING FROM EXPERIENCED SELLERS! ¬∑ MEET AND CONVERSE WITH PEOPLE FROM ALL WALKS OF LIFE! ¬∑ GET OUT WHAT YOU PUT IN! ¬∑ DEVELOP KEY SKILLS SUCH AS COMMUNICATION, SALES AND MARKETING! ¬∑ GAIN CONFIDENCE AND RESILIENCE! DON‚ÄôT MISS OUT! To apply and find out more information about this exciting opportunity, please WhatsApp the words ‚ÄòEXPERIENCE ‚Äô to 07450960942" rel="nofollow">07450960942 to get started, and a team member shall be in touch to provide more information and to sign up at our office, where you shall need to provide ID and a proof of address. We look forward to hearing from you today!

title: IMMEDIATE START CASH IN HAND EVERYBODY WELCOME FULL TRAINING GIVEN - *PAID JOB* CASH IN HAND
salary: Commission based EARN 50 -200 PER SHIFT DEPENDING ON YOUR SKILL SET FULL TRAINING
description: CHARITY FUNDRAISING OPPORTUNITY ‚Äì ALL EXPERIENCE LEVELS WELCOME! WE NEED YOUR HELP! Our clients work tirelessly to improve the health, wellness and livelihoods for those who require support across the UK through their charities. As they continue to grow, we are currently recruiting enthusiastic and motivated fundraisers to promote their activities and services to the public to raise money to continue making a positive difference to those in need. This is a commission-based role, with part time, full time and temporary opportunities available and fundraisers shall be expected to travel to different locations around the UK to do a street collection in busy areas, which you will be attending with your team leader. Starting between the hours between 9/10AM and return to the office between 5/6PM. Locations are based within or outside London, and the office is based in London, so it is essential that fundraisers can travel to the London area and can travel daily! You will be required to dress role as you will be outside! You must, be at least 18 years old, be fluent with English and be well-presented. SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE We welcome applications from those with experience Sales, Customer Service, Advertising, Promotions, Retail, Call Centre, Hospitality or Marketing. However, this isn‚Äôt essential the below skills are most important! ¬∑ Energised, with an enthusiastic and positive interaction with customers (BIG SMILES ARE ESSENTIAL)! ¬∑ Well-spoken with excellent communication skills. ¬∑ Strong time management and organisational skills, with responsibility to attend sites and return to the office on time, with prompt notification to team leader if any issues arise. ¬∑ Ability to explain and uphold the culture and values of the charity which is being represented on each shift, whilst adhering to the site‚Äôs code of conduct. WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM US. ¬∑ Cash in hand daily after each shift depending on amount of money raised. ¬∑ A flexible schedule, with shifts booked in weekly. ¬∑ All marketing and branded charity materials provided, including modern card machines (not everyone has cash!!). ¬∑ Training from professional sellers in the industry, who constantly support and motivate you to be at your best and develop excellent skills! SOUND LIKE YOU? ¬∑ WhatsApp the words ‚Äò CASH STREET‚Äô to 07892936771 for fast response from our team. ¬∑ We shall contact you to provide more details on the role and how to sign up. ¬∑ To sign up, you will need to visit our office with a proof of address and ID! What are you waiting for? Apply today!!

title: Spread the Cheer & Earn Top Tier Commission! üéÑ‚ú®
description: Are you the life of the party? A natural-born storyteller? If you can strike up a conversation with anyone and have a passion for making a difference, Our Forgotten Neighbours needs YOU this festive season! We are looking for high-energy, "people-persons" to join our street fundraising squad immediately! As the weather gets colder, the plight of our forgotten neighbours becomes even more urgent. We need approachable, snazzy, and persuasive sales pros to be our voice on the streets of London. Earn up to ¬£200 per day with cash paid directly in hand. No experience necessary ‚Äì full training provided. The Gig: Where: You‚Äôll be at the heart of the action‚Äîoutside major supermarkets, bustling festive markets, and high-traffic tube stations. What: Chatting with the public, sharing the incredible work we do for those in need, and collecting vital donations. When: Flexibility is key! We have Full-Time (Mon‚ÄìFri) and Part-Time (Sat‚ÄìSun) flexible hours roles available throughout December. What‚Äôs In It For You? 40% Commission: One of the most competitive rates in the charity sector. Your hard work directly reflects your pay! Daily Cash Pay: No waiting for payday‚Äîget your earnings in hand at the end of every single shift. üí∏ Holiday Vibes: Spend your workday soaking up the festive atmosphere at London's most iconic Christmas spots. Who You Are: Sales Savvy: You have experience in sales or face-to-face customer service and know how to close a deal with a smile. Outgoing & Inviting: You‚Äôre the person people want to talk to. You are impeccable with people and can handle the public with grace and charm. Hardworking , Reliable & Driven, with a positive "can-do" attitude: You‚Äôre motivated by the cause not just the commission, showing up rain or shine to make a move for our neighbours (homeless and vulberable). What we offer: Supportive team environment, Cash paid daily. YOU MUST be available to start immediately. Make your Christmas count‚Äîboth for your pocket and for those who need it most. Ready to join the squad? Interested? Text "NEIGHBOURS" to 07932 622496 to get started!

We are looking for high-energy, "people-persons" to join our street fundraising squad immediately! As the weather gets colder, the plight of our forgotten neighbours becomes even more urgent. We need approachable, snazzy, and persuasive sales pros to be our voice on the streets of London. Earn up to ¬£200 per day with cash paid directly in hand. No experience necessary ‚Äì full training provided. The Gig: Where: You‚Äôll be at the heart of the action‚Äîoutside major supermarkets, bustling festive markets, and high-traffic tube stations. What: Chatting with the public, sharing the incredible work we do for those in need, and collecting vital donations. When: Flexibility is key! We have Full-Time (Mon‚ÄìFri) and Part-Time (Sat‚ÄìSun) flexible hours roles available throughout December. What‚Äôs In It For You? 40% Commission: One of the most competitive rates in the charity sector. Your hard work directly reflects your pay! Daily Cash Pay: No waiting for payday‚Äîget your earnings in hand at the end of every single shift. üí∏ Holiday Vibes: Spend your workday soaking up the festive atmosphere at London's most iconic Christmas spots. Who You Are: Sales Savvy: You have experience in sales or face-to-face customer service and know how to close a deal with a smile. Outgoing & Inviting: You‚Äôre the person people want to talk to. You are impeccable with people and can handle the public with grace and charm. Hardworking , Reliable & Driven, with a positive "can-do" attitude: You‚Äôre motivated by the cause not just the commission, showing up rain or shine to make a move for our neighbours (homeless and vulberable). What we offer: Supportive team environment, Cash paid daily. YOU MUST be available to start immediately. Make your Christmas count‚Äîboth for your pocket and for those who need it most. Ready to join the squad? Interested? Text "NEIGHBOURS" to 07932 622496 to get started!

title: IMMEDIATE START CASH IN HAND EVERYBODY WELCOME FULL TRAINING GIVEN - *PAID JOB* CASH IN HAND
salary: Commission based EARN 50 -200 PER SHIFT DEPENDING ON YOUR SKILL SET FULL TRAINING
description: CHARITY FUNDRAISING OPPORTUNITY ‚Äì ALL EXPERIENCE LEVELS WELCOME! WE NEED YOUR HELP! Our clients work tirelessly to improve the health, wellness and livelihoods for those who require support across the UK through their charities. As they continue to grow, we are currently recruiting enthusiastic and motivated fundraisers to promote their activities and services to the public to raise money to continue making a positive difference to those in need. This is a commission-based role, with part time, full time and temporary opportunities available and fundraisers shall be expected to travel to different locations around the UK to do a street collection in busy areas, which you will be attending with your team leader. Starting between the hours between 9/10AM and return to the office between 5/6PM. Locations are based within or outside London, and the office is based in London, so it is essential that fundraisers can travel to the London area and can travel daily! You will be required to dress role as you will be outside! You must, be at least 18 years old, be fluent with English and be well-presented. SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE We welcome applications from those with experience Sales, Customer Service, Advertising, Promotions, Retail, Call Centre, Hospitality or Marketing. However, this isn‚Äôt essential the below skills are most important! ¬∑ Energised, with an enthusiastic and positive interaction with customers (BIG SMILES ARE ESSENTIAL)! ¬∑ Well-spoken with excellent communication skills. ¬∑ Strong time management and organisational skills, with responsibility to attend sites and return to the office on time, with prompt notification to team leader if any issues arise. ¬∑ Ability to explain and uphold the culture and values of the charity which is being represented on each shift, whilst adhering to the site‚Äôs code of conduct. WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM US. ¬∑ Cash in hand daily after each shift depending on amount of money raised. ¬∑ A flexible schedule, with shifts booked in weekly. ¬∑ All marketing and branded charity materials provided, including modern card machines (not everyone has cash!!). ¬∑ Training from professional sellers in the industry, who constantly support and motivate you to be at your best and develop excellent skills! SOUND LIKE YOU? ¬∑ WhatsApp the words ‚Äò CASH STREET‚Äô to 07892936771 for fast response from our team. ¬∑ We shall contact you to provide more details on the role and how to sign up. ¬∑ To sign up, you will need to visit our office with a proof of address and ID! What are you waiting for? Apply today!!
